UpdateModelMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client
Contains all the elements of the game: - round is the index of the current round; - players is the list off all the players involved in the game; - draft contains all the dice in the draft pool; - roundTrack contains all the dice in the round track.
UpdateModelMessage() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.UpdateModelMessage
Class constructor.
UpdateModelMessage(int, List<Player>, List<Die>, List<Die>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.UpdateModelMessage
Class constructor specifying round, players involved, draft pool and round track in a moment of the game.
useDie(int, int, int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Inserts a die - taken from the draft pool - in the window of a player, at the given coordinates (x, y).
useToolCard(int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Reduces the tokens available to the player (-1 if the tool card has not been used yet, -2 otherwise) and sets the toolcard as already used.
